canonical_explanation.text: Food provides our body with nutrients needed for energy, growth, and health. Carbohydrates and fats give us energy. Proteins help us grow. Vitamins and minerals protect us from diseases. A balanced diet contains all nutrients in the right amounts. We should eat healthy food and avoid too much junk food.
rules: Carbohydrates (rice, bread, potato) give us energy
Proteins (milk, eggs, dal) help our body grow and repair
Fats (butter, oil) give energy and keep us warm
Vitamins and minerals (fruits, vegetables) keep us healthy
A balanced diet includes all food groups in the right amounts
Drinking water is essential for our body

questions.question_text: Which nutrient gives us energy?
questions.explanation_correct: Carbohydrates give us energy because they are the main fuel that our body uses to move, play, and do all the things we need to do every day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Vitamins, minerals, and water are all important for our health, but they do not directly provide energy to our body. Proteins help us grow and repair our body, but they are not the main source of energy. Carbohydrates are the nutrient that gives us the energy we need to be active and have fun.

questions.question_text: Which nutrient helps our body grow?
questions.explanation_correct: Proteins help our body grow and become stronger. They are the building blocks that allow our muscles, bones, and other parts of our body to develop and function properly.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carbohydrates and fats provide energy for our body, but they don't help us grow. Water is important for our health, but it doesn't directly help us grow. Proteins are the nutrients that are responsible for helping our body grow and become stronger.

questions.question_text: Which nutrient keeps us healthy and protects from diseases?
questions.explanation_correct: Vitamins and minerals are the nutrients that keep us healthy and protect us from diseases. They help our body fight against germs and illnesses. This is why option D is the correct answer.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carbohydrates, proteins, and fats are important for energy and growth, but they do not protect us from diseases. Vitamins and minerals are the nutrients that keep our body healthy and strong to fight against illnesses. This is why option D, 'Vitamins and minerals', is the correct answer.

questions.question_text: Why should we drink water every day?

options.text: Water is needed for all body functions

questions.explanation_correct: We should drink water every day because water is needed for all body functions. Our body needs water to work properly and stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not only drink water when we are thirsty. Water is very important for our body and we need to drink it every day, not just in the summer. Water helps our body do many important things like digesting food, circulating blood, and removing waste.

questions.question_text: A balanced diet means eating:

options.text: All types of food in right amounts

questions.explanation_correct: A balanced diet means eating all types of food like fruits, vegetables, grains, proteins, and dairy in the right amounts. This gives your body the different nutrients it needs to stay healthy and grow strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: A balanced diet does not mean eating only one type of food. Your body needs a variety of nutrients from different foods to function properly. Eating only junk food is also not a balanced diet, as it lacks important vitamins and minerals. And you should not eat very little food either, as your body needs the right amount of food to have energy and grow.

questions.question_text: Which group of foods are called energy-giving foods?
questions.explanation_correct: Rice, bread, and cereals are called energy-giving foods because they are made up of carbohydrates. Carbohydrates provide energy to our bodies to help us move and do activities.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fruits and vegetables, milk and eggs, and water and juice are not the main energy-giving foods. These foods provide other important nutrients like vitamins, minerals, and proteins, but they do not give us the most energy. The correct answer is rice, bread, and cereals, which are made up of carbohydrates that give us the most energy to do our daily activities.

questions.question_text: Which group of foods are called body-building foods?
questions.explanation_correct: Milk, eggs, and dal are called body-building foods because they contain proteins, which help our bodies grow and repair tissues.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice and bread, butter and oil, and sugar and sweets are not body-building foods. These foods provide energy, but they don't help our bodies grow and repair tissues like milk, eggs, and dal do. Milk, eggs, and dal are the correct answer because they are rich in proteins, which are the nutrients that help our bodies grow.

questions.question_text: Which foods are called protective foods?
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables are called protective foods because they contain many vitamins and minerals that protect our body from diseases. They help keep us healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice, wheat, meat, and fish are not considered protective foods. These foods give us energy and help us grow, but they don't have the special vitamins and minerals that fruits and vegetables have to protect our body from illnesses.

questions.question_text: Which food is rich in carbohydrates?
questions.explanation_correct: Rice is rich in carbohydrates, which are one of the main nutrients that give our body energy. Carbohydrates are found in starchy foods like rice, bread, and potatoes.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk is not rich in carbohydrates. Milk contains more proteins and fats. Fish also does not contain a lot of carbohydrates. Oranges have some carbohydrates, but they are mostly in the form of natural sugars. Rice is the correct answer because it is a starchy food that is a good source of carbohydrates, which provide energy for our body.

questions.question_text: Which food is rich in protein?
questions.explanation_correct: Eggs are rich in protein, which helps our body grow and stay healthy. Proteins are an important nutrient that we get from foods like eggs, meat, and dairy products.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Bread, butter, and apples do not contain as much protein as eggs. Eggs are a great source of protein, which is needed for our muscles and other parts of our body to grow strong and work well.

questions.question_text: Which food is rich in fats?
questions.explanation_correct: Butter is rich in fats. Fats are one of the main nutrients in our food that provide us with energy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Rice, carrot, and dal are not rich in fats. These foods contain other nutrients like carbohydrates and vitamins, but not as much fat as butter. Butter is made from milk and contains a lot of healthy fats that our body needs.

questions.question_text: Oranges and lemons are rich in:
questions.explanation_correct: Oranges and lemons are rich in vitamin C. Vitamin C is an important nutrient that helps protect our body from getting sick and keeps us healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Oranges and lemons are not rich in protein, carbohydrates, or fats. They are fruits that contain a lot of vitamin C, which is important for our health and helps our body fight against diseases.

questions.question_text: Which food should we eat for strong bones?
questions.explanation_correct: We should eat milk for strong bones because it contains a lot of calcium. Calcium is a mineral that helps make our bones and teeth strong and healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not eat chips, candy, or soft drinks for strong bones. These foods are high in sugar and fat, but do not have the important nutrients like calcium that our bones need to grow strong. Milk, on the other hand, is full of calcium that helps build strong bones.

questions.question_text: Which method is used to preserve food at home?
questions.explanation_correct: Keeping food in the refrigerator is the best way to preserve it at home. The cold temperature of the refrigerator helps slow down the spoiling of food, so it lasts longer and doesn't go bad as quickly.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Throwing away food is not a way to preserve it. Leaving food in the sun can actually make it go bad faster. Keeping food in water is also not a good way to preserve it, as the water can make the food spoil more quickly. The correct answer is keeping food in the refrigerator, as the cold temperature helps preserve the food.

questions.question_text: Why do we refrigerate food?

options.text: To keep it fresh and prevent spoiling

questions.explanation_correct: We refrigerate food to keep it fresh and prevent it from spoiling. The cold temperature in the refrigerator slows down the growth of bacteria and fungi that can make food go bad.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We do not refrigerate food to make it taste better or change its color. Refrigeration is important because it helps keep food fresh and stops it from spoiling quickly. The cold temperature in the refrigerator slows down the growth of bacteria and other microorganisms that can make food unsafe to eat.

questions.question_text: Pickles are preserved using:
questions.explanation_correct: Pickles are preserved using salt and oil. The salt and oil help keep the pickles from getting spoiled and last for a long time.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Pickles are not preserved using just water or sugar. Water alone cannot keep pickles fresh for a long time. Sugar is also not the main ingredient used to preserve pickles. The correct way to preserve pickles is by using a combination of salt and oil, which helps prevent the growth of harmful bacteria.

questions.question_text: We should wash our hands:
questions.explanation_correct: We should wash our hands before eating because that helps remove any germs or dirt on our hands, which can get into our food and make us sick. Washing our hands before eating is an important way to stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: We should not wait until after we eat to wash our hands. Germs and dirt on our hands can get into our food and make us sick if we don't wash our hands before eating. Washing in the morning is also not enough, as we can pick up new germs throughout the day. The best time to wash our hands is right before we start eating.

questions.question_text: Why should we avoid too much junk food?

options.text: It is not healthy and can make us sick

questions.explanation_correct: We should avoid too much junk food because it is not healthy and can make us sick. Junk food has a lot of sugar, fat, and unhealthy ingredients that can harm our body if we eat too much of it.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Junk food may taste very good, but it is not good for our health. It has a lot of unhealthy things like sugar, fat, and salt that can make us sick if we eat too much of it. Things that are healthy for us, like fruits and vegetables, are the best foods to eat.

questions.question_text: We should chew our food:
questions.explanation_correct: We should chew our food properly and slowly because this helps our body digest the food better. When we chew our food well, it gets broken down into smaller pieces that are easier for our stomach to process.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Chewing our food very quickly is not good because it doesn't allow our body to properly digest the food. We should chew our food slowly and thoroughly so that it can be easily broken down and used by our body.

questions.question_text: Which nutrient helps in repairing damaged body parts?
questions.explanation_correct: Proteins help repair and build our body parts like muscles, bones, and skin. This is why proteins are important for our growth and development.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carbohydrates and fats provide energy to our body, but they do not help repair damaged parts. Water is important for many body functions, but it does not directly help repair body parts. Proteins are the nutrient that helps build and repair our body tissues, so the correct answer is proteins.

questions.question_text: Fats help to:
questions.explanation_correct: Fats help keep the body warm because they are a good source of energy. Fats are like a blanket that traps heat inside our body and keeps us from getting too cold.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fats do not cool the body, clean the body, or wet the body. Fats are a type of nutrient that provides energy and insulation to keep the body warm.

questions.question_text: Carrots are good for our:
questions.explanation_correct: Carrots are good for our eyes because they contain a lot of vitamin A. Vitamin A helps keep our eyes healthy and sharp, and it can even help us see better in the dark.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carrots are not good for our ears, nose, or legs. Carrots are filled with vitamin A, which is important for keeping our eyes healthy and strong. That's why the correct answer is that carrots are good for our eyes.

questions.question_text: A child who eats only rice and no vegetables may:

options.text: Lack vitamins and get sick easily

questions.explanation_correct: A child who eats only rice and no vegetables will lack important vitamins and minerals, and can get sick easily. Vegetables are very important for good health and to protect the body from diseases.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is B. Eating only rice and no vegetables will not make the child very healthy. Vegetables have many vitamins and minerals that the body needs to grow strong and stay healthy. If a child does not eat vegetables, they can become weak and sick more often.

questions.question_text: Which of these is NOT a source of protein?
questions.explanation_correct: Sugar is not a source of protein. Proteins are important for our body to grow and stay healthy. Foods like eggs, dal, and fish contain proteins, but sugar does not.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is C) Sugar. Sugar is a type of carbohydrate that gives us energy, but it does not contain any proteins. Foods like eggs, dal, and fish are good sources of proteins that help our body grow and stay strong.

questions.question_text: Drying food in the sun preserves it by:
questions.explanation_correct: Drying food in the sun removes water from the food, which helps preserve it. This is because the sun's heat causes the water in the food to evaporate, making it harder for bacteria and mold to grow and spoil the food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Drying food in the sun does not add more water to the food. It actually removes the water, which is the reason it helps preserve the food. Adding more water would make the food spoil faster, so that is not the right way to preserve it.

questions.question_text: We should eat food at:
questions.explanation_correct: We should eat food at regular times each day because our body needs a steady supply of nutrients to function properly. Eating at the same times every day helps our body know when to expect food and prepare to digest it efficiently.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating food any time we want or only once a day is not good for our health. Our body needs a steady supply of nutrients throughout the day to give us energy, help us grow, and keep us healthy. Waiting until we are very hungry can make us overeat, which is also not good. Eating at regular times, like breakfast, lunch, and dinner, is the best way to make sure our body gets the right amount of nutrients it needs.

questions.question_text: Roughage or fiber helps in:
questions.explanation_correct: Roughage or fiber helps in digestion. Fiber is important for our body because it helps food move through our digestive system smoothly. This prevents constipation and keeps our digestive system healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Roughage or fiber does not help us run fast, sleep well, or read. Fiber is a type of carbohydrate that is good for our digestive health, but it does not have any direct impact on these other activities. The correct answer is that fiber helps with digestion.

questions.question_text: Which food gives us fiber?
questions.explanation_correct: Vegetables contain fiber, which is important for our health. Fiber helps to keep our digestive system working well and to make us feel full. That's why vegetables are the right answer for giving us fiber.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk, butter, and oil do not contain fiber. Fiber is found in plant-based foods like fruits, vegetables, and whole grains. Vegetables are the best choice for getting fiber in our diet.

questions.question_text: For a balanced lunch, we should eat:
questions.explanation_correct: For a balanced lunch, we should eat rice, dal (lentils), vegetables, and curd. This is because it provides us with all the nutrients we need - carbohydrates from the rice for energy, proteins from the dal to help us grow, vitamins and minerals from the vegetables to keep us healthy, and probiotics from the curd to aid digestion.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating only rice, chips, or sweets would not give us a balanced diet. We need a mix of different foods to get all the nutrients our body requires. Chips and sweets are junk food that have a lot of unhealthy fats and sugars, so we should avoid eating too much of them. A healthy lunch should include a variety of foods like rice, dal, vegetables, and curd to make sure we get all the nutrients we need.

questions.question_text: Eating fresh fruits is better than drinking packaged juice because:

options.text: Fresh fruits have more fiber and vitamins

questions.explanation_correct: Fresh fruits have more fiber and vitamins compared to packaged juice. Fiber is important for digestion, and vitamins help keep your body healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: While fruits may be more expensive, the correct answer is that fresh fruits have more fiber and vitamins compared to packaged juice. This is because the juicing process removes some of the nutrients found in the whole fruit.

questions.question_text: Carbohydrates give us energy.
questions.explanation_correct: Carbohydrates are one of the main nutrients in food that give our body energy. They are found in foods like bread, rice, pasta, and fruits. When we eat these foods, our body breaks down the carbohydrates and uses them to power our muscles and brain.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Carbohydrates do not give us energy. That is not correct. Carbohydrates are an important nutrient that our body needs, but they are not the ones that give us energy. The nutrients that give us energy are fats and carbohydrates. So the statement 'Carbohydrates give us energy' is true.

questions.question_text: Proteins help us grow.
questions.explanation_correct: Proteins help us grow and build our muscles, bones, and other body parts. They are an important nutrient that our body needs to develop and stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Proteins do not give us energy. That is the job of carbohydrates and fats. However, proteins are very important for helping our body grow and develop. They are the building blocks that make up our muscles, bones, and other tissues.

questions.question_text: We can live without drinking water.
questions.explanation_correct: We cannot live without drinking water because our body needs water to function properly. Water helps our body to digest food, carry nutrients, and remove waste. Without drinking water, our body would not be able to work well and we would get very sick.
questions.explanation_incorrect: It is false that we can live without drinking water. Our body needs water to survive. Water makes up about 60% of our body. We need to drink water regularly to stay healthy and active. If we don't drink enough water, we can become dehydrated, which can make us feel tired, headachy, and sick.

questions.question_text: A balanced diet contains all types of food.
questions.explanation_correct: A balanced diet contains all the different types of food that our body needs, like carbohydrates, proteins, fats, vitamins, and minerals. This ensures we get all the nutrients we need to stay healthy and energetic.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some people might think a balanced diet is just one type of food, like only vegetables or only meat. But a balanced diet actually needs to have a variety of different foods to provide all the nutrients our body requires. It's important to eat different types of food to stay healthy.

questions.question_text: Milk is rich in protein.
questions.explanation_correct: Milk is rich in protein. Proteins are important for our body to grow and stay healthy. Milk contains a lot of protein, which is why it is good for us to drink milk.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Milk does not contain only carbohydrates and fats. It also contains a lot of proteins, which help our body grow. Proteins are an important nutrient that we get from milk and other dairy products, not just from foods like meat and eggs.

questions.question_text: Butter is rich in vitamins.
questions.explanation_correct: Butter is not rich in vitamins. Butter is made from animal fat and contains a lot of saturated fat, which is not good for our health. It does not have many vitamins that our body needs.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Butter is not rich in vitamins. Vitamins are important nutrients that help our body stay healthy, but butter is not a good source of vitamins. Butter is mostly made of fat, which gives us energy, but it does not have the vitamins and minerals that our body needs to grow and stay strong.

questions.question_text: Refrigerating food helps keep it fresh.
questions.explanation_correct: Refrigerating food helps keep it fresh for longer because the cold temperature slows down the growth of bacteria and mold that can spoil the food.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Refrigerating food does not actually make it go bad faster. In fact, the opposite is true. Keeping food in the refrigerator at a cool temperature helps slow down the growth of bacteria and keeps the food fresher for a longer period of time.

questions.question_text: Junk food is healthy for us.
questions.explanation_correct: Junk food is not healthy for us because it has a lot of unhealthy things like sugar, fat, and salt. Eating too much junk food can make us feel sick and lead to health problems.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Junk food like chips, burgers, and soda might taste good, but it is not good for our body. Junk food does not have the nutrients we need to be healthy and strong. We should eat more fruits, vegetables, and other healthy foods instead of too much junk food.

questions.question_text: We should wash fruits before eating.
questions.explanation_correct: It is important to wash fruits before eating them. This helps remove any dirt, germs, or pesticides that may be on the surface of the fruit. Washing the fruit keeps it clean and safe to eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Some people may think it is not necessary to wash fruits before eating, but that is not correct. Fruits can have dirt, germs, or chemicals on them that can make you sick if you eat them without washing first. Always remember to wash your fruits thoroughly before eating to keep yourself healthy.

questions.question_text: Eating only one type of food is healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: Eating only one type of food is not healthy because our body needs different types of nutrients to stay healthy. A balanced diet with different kinds of foods is important for growth and energy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Eating only one type of food is not healthy because our body needs different nutrients like carbohydrates, proteins, fats, vitamins, and minerals. If we eat just one food, we may not get all the nutrients we need. A balanced diet with different foods is better for our health.

questions.question_text: _____ give us energy to work and play.
questions.explanation_correct: Carbohydrates give us energy to work and play because they are the main source of energy for our body. When we eat carbohydrate-rich foods like rice, bread, and fruits, our body can convert them into a type of energy called glucose that powers our muscles and brain.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fats do not give us energy to work and play. Carbohydrates are the right answer because they are the main source of energy for our body. When we eat carbohydrate-rich foods like rice, bread, and fruits, our body can convert them into a type of energy called glucose that powers our muscles and brain. The correct answer is 'Carbohydrates'.

questions.question_text: _____ help our body grow and repair.
questions.explanation_correct: Proteins help our body grow and repair because they are the building blocks of our body. They are needed for our muscles, bones, and other tissues to develop and stay healthy.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'Proteins'. Proteins are the nutrients that help our body grow and repair. Carbohydrates and fats give us energy, but they don't help us grow. Vitamins and minerals protect us from diseases, but they don't directly help us grow either. So the right answer is Proteins.

questions.question_text: Vitamins and _____ protect us from diseases.
questions.explanation_correct: Vitamins and minerals are important nutrients that help protect our body from diseases. Minerals like iron, calcium, and zinc are necessary for our immune system to work properly and fight off infections.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The answer is 'minerals'. Vitamins and minerals are both important for our health. Vitamins help our body grow and function, while minerals protect us from diseases by boosting our immune system. The missing word in the sentence should be 'minerals'.

questions.question_text: A diet that has all nutrients in the right amount is called a _____ diet.
questions.explanation_correct: A balanced diet has all the nutrients our body needs, like carbohydrates for energy, proteins for growth, and vitamins to keep us healthy. This ensures our body gets everything it requires to function properly.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is a 'balanced' diet. This means a diet that has all the different nutrients our body needs in the right amounts. A diet that is missing some nutrients or has too much of one thing is not considered balanced.

questions.question_text: Rice and bread are rich in _____.
questions.explanation_correct: Rice and bread are rich in carbohydrates, which are the main source of energy for our body. Carbohydrates give us the strength to play, study, and do all our daily activities.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'carbohydrates'. Carbohydrates are nutrients found in foods like rice, bread, and pasta that provide energy for our body. They are not the same as proteins, which help our body grow, or vitamins and minerals, which protect us from diseases. So rice and bread are not rich in proteins, vitamins, or minerals, but they are rich in the energy-giving nutrient called carbohydrates.

questions.question_text: Eggs and fish are rich in _____.
questions.explanation_correct: Eggs and fish are rich in protein, which helps our body grow and develop. Protein is an important nutrient that is needed for building and repairing tissues in our body.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'protein'. Eggs and fish are good sources of protein, which is a nutrient that helps our body grow and become strong. The other nutrients like carbohydrates, fats, vitamins and minerals are also important, but they do not make up the main part of eggs and fish.

questions.question_text: Butter and oil are rich in _____.
questions.explanation_correct: Butter and oil are rich in fats. Fats are a type of nutrient that gives our body energy. They help keep our skin and hair healthy too.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'fats'. Butter and oil contain a lot of fats, which are one of the main nutrients our body needs. The other main nutrients are carbohydrates, proteins, vitamins, and minerals. Fats give us energy and help our body grow and stay healthy.

questions.question_text: Keeping food in a _____ prevents it from spoiling quickly.
questions.explanation_correct: Keeping food in a refrigerator prevents it from spoiling quickly. The refrigerator keeps the food cold, which slows down the growth of bacteria that can make the food go bad.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is refrigerator. A refrigerator is a special box that keeps food cold so it doesn't spoil quickly. The cold temperature stops bacteria from growing on the food and making it go bad. Other places like a cupboard or a shelf don't keep the food as cold, so the food can spoil faster.

questions.question_text: We should wash our _____ before eating food.
questions.explanation_correct: We should wash our hands before eating food because our hands can have germs and dirt that can make us sick if we don't clean them. Washing our hands with soap and water helps remove these germs, so we stay healthy when we eat.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'hands'. We should wash our hands before eating food to remove any germs or dirt that can make us sick. We cannot wash our feet or face before eating - only our hands need to be cleaned before we start eating.

questions.question_text: We should drink 6-8 glasses of _____ every day.
questions.explanation_correct: We should drink 6-8 glasses of water every day because water is essential for our body. Water helps us stay hydrated, carry nutrients to our cells, and remove waste from our body. Drinking enough water keeps us healthy and active.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'water'. Our body needs water to function properly. Water helps us digest our food, regulates our body temperature, and keeps our skin healthy. It's important to drink 6-8 glasses of water every day, not other drinks like juice or soda.

questions.question_text: Fruits and vegetables are called _____ foods.
questions.explanation_correct: Fruits and vegetables are called protective foods because they are full of vitamins and minerals that help protect our body from diseases. They keep us healthy and strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct answer is 'protective'. Fruits and vegetables are called protective foods because they contain lots of vitamins and minerals that help protect our body from getting sick. These nutrients are important for our health and growth, so we should eat plenty of fruits and vegetables every day.

questions.question_text: Vitamin C is found in _____ and lemons.
questions.explanation_correct: Vitamin C is found in oranges because oranges are a type of fruit that contains lots of this important vitamin. Vitamin C helps keep our body healthy and strong.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Vitamin C is not found in lemons, it is found in oranges. Oranges are a type of citrus fruit that contain high amounts of vitamin C, which is important for our health. Lemons also have some vitamin C, but not as much as oranges.

questions.question_text: Arrange the meals in the order we eat them during the day.
questions.explanation_correct: We eat breakfast first in the morning to get energy for the day. Then we have lunch in the middle of the day, and finally we have dinner in the evening. This is the right order for the meals we eat during the day.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Dinner is not the first meal we eat in the day. We start with breakfast, then have lunch, and finish with dinner in the evening. This is the correct order for our daily meals.

questions.question_text: Arrange foods by how much energy they give (most to least).
questions.explanation_correct: Rice gives the most energy because it is a type of carbohydrate, which is the main source of energy in our body. Fruits have medium energy because they contain a mix of carbohydrates, vitamins, and minerals. Vegetables have the least energy because they are mostly made of fiber and water.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The correct order from most energy to least energy is: Rice, Fruits, Vegetables. Rice is a carbohydrate-rich food that provides a lot of energy. Fruits have some carbohydrates and other nutrients that give medium energy. Vegetables are mostly made of fiber and water, so they provide the least amount of energy compared to rice and fruits.

questions.question_text: Arrange the steps of eating in correct order.
questions.explanation_correct: The correct order is: Wash hands, Sit down to eat, Chew food properly, Wash hands after eating. This is the right order because you should always wash your hands before eating to keep germs away. Then you sit down to eat your food properly. After eating, you should wash your hands again to clean up.
questions.explanation_incorrect: The incorrect order is: Chew food properly, Wash hands, Sit down to eat, Wash hands after eating. This is not the right order because you should always wash your hands before eating, not after. Also, you should sit down to eat your food, not just chew it. The correct order is: Wash hands, Sit down to eat, Chew food properly, Wash hands after eating.

questions.question_text: Arrange from healthiest to least healthy.
questions.explanation_correct: Vegetables are the healthiest because they are packed with important vitamins, minerals, and fiber that help keep our bodies strong and healthy. Fresh fruits are also very healthy, but they have more natural sugars than vegetables. Chips are the least healthy because they are high in unhealthy fats and salt, which can be bad for us if we eat too much.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Chips are not the healthiest food. They are high in unhealthy fats and salt, which can be bad for our bodies if we eat too many. Fresh fruits are healthier than chips because they have natural sugars and vitamins that are good for us. Vegetables are the healthiest of all because they have the most vitamins, minerals, and fiber to keep our bodies strong and healthy.

questions.question_text: Arrange food items by how quickly they spoil (fastest to slowest).
questions.explanation_correct: Fresh milk spoils the fastest because it is a perishable food item that can go bad quickly. Fresh vegetables also spoil faster than dried lentils, which can last a long time without going bad.
questions.explanation_incorrect: Fresh milk spoils the fastest because it is a liquid that can easily get contaminated. Fresh vegetables come next because they are made of water and can rot quickly. Dried lentils take the longest to spoil because they have very little moisture and are not perishable like the other two foods.
